history.content:
According to the instructors for the Deep RL course:

"Yes, enrollment is closed (the wait list has 120+ students as well). We did send notifications to everyone who was in top 40 spots on the wait list. Unfortunately, the size of the class is limited by the facilities and GSI hours, but we'll do our best to get lecture videos and materials online. There is also a subreddit (linked from the course website) for enrolled and unenrolled students to discuss with each other, though we ask only enrolled students to use the course Piazza system for questions & discussion."

If you're not even on the waitlist at this point, I'd be pretty surprised if you get in.  Sorry :(  Here's the subreddit they mention, if you want to follow along.  I'll let someone else comment on 280 since I'm not familiar with it.

-----------

with regards to 280, there's a signup sheet for the waitlist here https://docs.google.com/a/berkeley.edu/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf9yArPNuDUdzIbVfxI5_VNKIP6EMjdC4TiElwp_VNhaBQTyQ/viewform?c=0&w=1

I'm not sure if they looked at it yet but they're admitting based on grades in related classes

According to the instructors for the Deep RL course:

"Yes, enrollment is closed (the wait list has 120+ students as well). We did send notifications to everyone who was in top 40 spots on the wait list. Unfortunately, the size of the class is limited by the facilities and GSI hours, but we'll do our best to get lecture videos and materials online. There is also a subreddit (linked from the course website) for enrolled and unenrolled students to discuss with each other, though we ask only enrolled students to use the course Piazza system for questions & discussion."

If you're not even on the waitlist at this point, I'd be pretty surprised if you get in.  Sorry :(  Here's the subreddit they mention, if you want to follow along.  I'll let someone else comment on 280 since I'm not familiar with it.

As the adjustment period starts, I want to enroll in grad classes that I am interested in. However, I noticed that cs280 computer vision and cs294-112 deep reinforcement learning are closed and I could not even put myself on the waitlist. While I understand that most of the application will be processed by faculty when semester starts, I am just wondering if it is necessary to put myself on the waitlist first.
history.subject: Enrolling in grad class for undergraduate
